oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |uma tells of his experiences with a ghost (or ||gaun-a). 1) p.10 260v: |uma from personal observation; a note by Tamme (not translated) - continued on next verso page, 2) This story is found in Book XIII & XIV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The ||gaun-a. The Ghost
